column8: 594  families.Azna is located in the Zagros Mountains.

column1: It currently serves as a refuge camp for the Faili Kurds.This city is located 133  km. east of Khoramabad and 75 km. south of Arak. It experiences cold winters and moderate summers. The city is en route Esfahan  - Khuzestan and is connected to the railway network of the country.
